/*
 * This file is generated using typical-template.
 */
package org.codeblessing.typicaltemplate.template

import org.codeblessing.typicaltemplate.template.model.TemplateModel

/**
 * Generate the content for the template TemplateTest filled up
 * with the content of the passed models.
 */
object TemplateTest {

    fun renderTemplate(model: TemplateModel, models: List<TemplateModel>): String {
        return """
          | hello world
        """.trimMargin(marginPrefix = "|")
    }

    fun filePath(model: TemplateModel, models: List<TemplateModel>): String {
      return "dum-dir/dum-sub-dir/dummy.txt"
    }
}
